1.2.1.name: wordpress/associative-dictionary-widget
1.2.1.description:
This widget adds a dictionary to your sidebar and displays words from it through ajax calls. All the words in the description are links themselves, so you can keep wandering through the words. If a word has no description, a small form is displayed to make one up.

It is not meant to be useful, so it has no search. You can only hope visitors will come up with nice, sarcastic or cryptic descriptions.
